Uses of Package
com.nexmo.messaging.sdk

  • Packages that use com.nexmo.messaging.sdk 
    Package Description
    com.nexmo.messaging.sdk  
  • Classes in com.nexmo.messaging.sdk used by com.nexmo.messaging.sdk 
    Class and Description
    NexmoSmsClient
    NexmoSmsClient.java

    Client for talking to the Nexmo REST interface

    Usage To submit a message, first you should instanciate a NexmoSmsClient, passing the credentials for your Nexmo account on the constructor.
    SmsSubmissionReachabilityStatus
    SmsSubmissionReachabilityStatus.java

    Created on 5 January 2011, 17:34

    Represents the result of the reachability check that was performed when submitting the message if such a check was requested
    SmsSubmissionResult
    SmsSubmissionResult.java

    Created on 5 January 2011, 17:34

    Represents the result of the submission of a single sms message, or a single part of a long / multi-part message
